name: Siegfrost
description:
Little game about parallel universe infested with Nazi snowmen. Kill all snowmen
before taking portal to next level.

Important: While it works in a browser, the performance is not great, and mouse capture can behave in a weird way. Please use downloadable version if you can.

Controls:

  • Movement: W,A,S,D / arrows to move, mouse to look around.
  • Jump: space bar.
  • Fire: F or left mouse button.
  • Escape to pause, and Q to instantly quit.

This game was made for 7dfps jam. Built with Ebitengine and raycaster-go library.

Music by: https://audionautix.com/free-music/electronic
